sourcesContent:
import React,{useRef, useState} from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup} from 'reactstrap' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' import avatar from "../assets/images/avatar.jpg" const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() const reviewMsgRef = useRef('') const [tourRating, setTourRating]=useState(null) //this is a static data later we will call API and load our data from database const tour = tourData.find(tour=> tour.id === id) //destructure properties from tour object const {photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize} = tour const {totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews) //format Date const options = {day:'numeric', month:'long', year:'numeric'} //submit request to the server const submitHandler = e=>{ e.preventDefault() const reviewText = reviewMsgRef.current.value //later will call our API } return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ( 'Not Rated' ) : ( ({reviews?.length}) )} {address}
{city} ${price}/per person {distance} k/m {maxGroupSize} people
Description

{desc}

{/*=====================================Tour Review Section==========================================*/}

Reviews({reviews?.length} reviews)

setTourRating(1)}> 1 setTourRating(2)}> 2 setTourRating(3)}> 3 setTourRating(4)}> 4 setTourRating(5)}> 5
{ reviews?.map(review=>(
muhib

{new Date('01-18-2023').toLocaleDateString( "en-US", options )}

5
Amazing Tour
)) }
{/*=================================Tour Review Section end========================================*/}
) } export default TourDetails
